title: Ecco Bella Original Organic Water-Free Herbal Body Lotion, Vanilla, 8-Ounce Bottle
description: Nurture your skin with our concentrated, 100% water-free body treatment in four intoxicating fragrances. This Herbal Body Lotion is the ultimate remedy for dry skin. The rich water-free formula relieves skin of dryness, irritation, and flakiness, hours after other lotions have worn off. 70% Organic Ingredients. 100% Preservative Free.
